name: Loraine Lara
description: '''Loraine Lara Mercado'''{{family name footnote|Lara|Mercado|lang=Spanish}} (born 2000) is a Colombian [[vallenato]] accordionist, songwriter, and singer. In 2019 she was crowned vallenato queen at both the [[Vallenato Legend Festival]] and the [[Encuentro Vallenato Femenino]] for winning their respective accordionist competitions.
